dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine or remote medicine gives rise to new ways of organising nursing care It promotes collaborative professional practices especially between doctors and nurses authorised by the 2009 Hospital patients health and territories law The continuity of care at home is consolidated by medical telemonitoring which integrates nursing care and follow up This new organisation contributes to patients therapeutic education
Soins; la revue de référence infirmière
[The role of telemedicine in the organisation of care].
